data.name: Emergence Fractal Multiverse рха
data.detailed_description: Explore Fractals in Virtual Reality. Learn about Fractals and adjust parameters to see the how fractals work. Enjoy the psychedelic shapes that mathematics has to offer. Meditative soundtrack included ~
data.about_the_game: Explore Fractals in Virtual Reality. Learn about Fractals and adjust parameters to see the how fractals work. Enjoy the psychedelic shapes that mathematics has to offer. Meditative soundtrack included ~
data.short_description: Fractal Explorer and editor for HTC Vive and PC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 6700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
